accepted_values.description: The list of accepted values for this additional field. This field is only present for additional fields of type 'LIST'

channels.description: The list of channels using this additional field. This field is only present for additional fields linked to a 'SHOP' entity.

description.description: The description of the additional field.

entity.description: The object on which the additional field applies

models.description: The list of platform models using this additional field. This field is only present for additional fields linked to a 'SHOP' entity.

regex.description:
The regular expression that is used to validate the value value of this field.
This field is only present for additional fields of type 'REGEX'.

required.description: Whether or not this additionnal field will be required

shop_permission.description:
The shop permission field determines how Shops are allowed to use a Custom field.
  • INVISIBLE: the field is visible only for the operator and front users. Shops cannot update its value.
  • READ_WRITE: all users can see and update the value of the field, provided they have access to the entity associated with the field.

type.description:
Additional field type:
  • STRING chain of characters (up to 2000 characters)
  • DATE date in yyyy-mm-dd format
  • NUMERIC decimal value (eg 52.63)
  • BOOLEAN true or false
  • LINK valid URL
  • LIST list of values. Valid values are specified in accepted_values field
  • REGEX regular expression. The regex that is used to validate the value of this field is specified in the regex field
  • TEXTAREA long chain of characters (up to 5000 characters). May have multiple lines

entity.description: Entity type linked to the document type

models.description: The list of platform models on which this document type is available. This field is only present for document types linked to a 'SHOP' entity.

due_date.description: Due date for the payment of the accounting document

id.description: Accounting document identifier (use it for draft document)

invoice_id.description: Accounting document identifier (present if the accounting document is issued)

issue_date.description: Issue date of an accounting document

shop_corporate_name.description: Shop corporate name if it is a professional shop

shop_operator_internal_id.description: Operator internal id for the shop

shop_tax_number.description: Shop tax number if it is a professional shop

total_amount_excl_taxes.description: Total amount charged to the shop (excluding taxes)

total_amount_incl_taxes.description: Total amount charged to the shop (including taxes)

end_time.description: Ending date of the period for accounting document of type AUTO_INVOICE

start_time.description: Starting date of the period for accounting document of type AUTO_INVOICE

owner.description: Name of the owner of the payment information

bic.description: Bank account BIC code (aka Swift Code)

routing_number.description: Routing Number of the bank, (aka ABA code)

bank_account_type.description:
Account type
  • C : Checking account
  • P : Savings account

Account type
  • C : Checking account
  • P : Savings account

Account type
  • C : Checking account
  • P : Savings account

Account type
  • C : Checking account
  • P : Savings account

Account type
  • C : Checking account
  • P : Savings account

amount_transferred.description: Total amount to be transferred to the seller

amount_transferred_to_operator.description: Total amount to be transferred to the operator

reserve_funding.description: Amount set aside for the seller reserve

reserve_settlement.description: Amount paid out from the seller reserve

total_commissions_excl_tax.description: Total amount of commissions (excluding taxes on orders)

total_commissions_incl_tax.description: Total amount of commissions (including taxes on orders)

total_fee_excl_tax.description: Total amount of fees (excluding taxes on orders)

total_fee_incl_tax.description: Total amount of fees (including taxes on orders)

total_fee_operator_remitted_excl_tax.description: Total amount of fees remitted by the operator (excluding taxes on orders)

total_fee_operator_remitted_incl_tax.description: Total amount of fees remitted by the operator (including taxes on orders)

total_non_payable_orders_excl_tax.description: Total amount for non payable orders (including shipping charges and excluding taxes on orders)

total_non_payable_orders_incl_tax.description: Total amount for non payable orders (including shipping charges and taxes on orders)

total_operator_paid_shipping_charges_exc.description: Total amount of shipping charges paid by the operator (excluding taxes on orders)

total_operator_paid_shipping_charges_inc.description: Total amount of shipping charges paid by the operator (including taxes on orders)

total_operator_remitted_taxes.description: Total amount for order taxes remitted by the operator

total_other_credits_excl_tax.description: Total amount for other manual credits of a payment cycle (excluding taxes on stores)

total_other_credits_incl_tax.description: Total amount for other manual credits of a payment cycle (including taxes on stores)

total_other_invoices_excl_tax.description: Total amount for other manual invoices of a payment cycle (excluding taxes on stores)

total_other_invoices_incl_tax.description: Total amount for other manual invoices of a payment cycle (including taxes on stores)

total_payable_orders_excl_tax.description: Total amount for payable orders including shipping charges (excluding taxes on stores)

total_payable_orders_incl_tax.description: Total amount for payable orders including taxes (including taxes on orders)

total_refund_commissions_excl_tax.description: Total amount of refunded commissions (excluding taxes on orders)

total_refund_commissions_incl_tax.description: Total amount of refunded commissions (including taxes on orders)

total_refund_fee_excl_tax.description: Total amount of refunded fees (excluding taxes on orders)

total_refund_fee_incl_tax.description: Total amount of refunded fees (including taxes on orders)

total_refund_fee_operator_remitted_excl_.description: Total amount of refunded fees remitted by the operator (excluding taxes on orders)

total_refund_fee_operator_remitted_incl_.description: Total amount of refunded fees remitted by the operator (including taxes on orders)

total_refund_non_payable_orders_excl_tax.description: Total amount refunded for non payable orders (including shipping charges and excluding taxes on orders)

total_refund_non_payable_orders_incl_tax.description: Total amount refunded for non payable orders (excluding shipping charges and including taxes on orders)

total_refund_operator_paid_shipping_char.description: Total amount of refunded shipping charges paid by the operator (excluding taxes on orders)
Total amount of refunded shipping charges paid by the operator (including taxes on orders)

total_refund_operator_remitted_taxes.description: Total amount of refunded taxes remitted by the operator

total_refund_orders_excl_tax.description: Total amount of refunded orders (excluding all refunded taxes)

total_refund_orders_incl_tax.description: Total amount of refunded orders (including all refunded taxes)

total_refund_payable_orders_excl_tax.description: Total amount refunded for payable orders (excluding taxes on orders)

total_refund_payable_orders_incl_tax.description: Total amount refunded for payable orders (including taxes on orders)

total_refund_purchase_taxes.description: Total amount of refunded purchase taxes

total_seller_fees_on_orders_excl_tax.description: Total amount of seller fees on orders (excluding taxes on orders)

total_seller_fees_on_orders_incl_tax.description: Total amount of seller fees on orders (including taxes on orders)

total_seller_penalty_fees_excl_tax.description: Total amount of seller penalty fees (excluding taxes on orders)

total_seller_penalty_fees_incl_tax.description: Total amount of seller penalty fees (including taxes on orders)

total_subscription_excl_tax.description: Total amount of subscription fees (excluding taxes on stores)

total_subscription_incl_tax.description: Total amount of subscription taxes (including taxes on stores)

order_id.description: Associated order id. Only for MANUAL_INVOICE or MANUAL_CREDIT type

information.description: User name if user type is OPERATOR or PARTNER, "Automatic action" if user type is BATCH

country.description: Shop contact country (Formatted in ISO 3166-1). Used by Mirakl to format the address (back office, delivery bill, invoices...) and to adapt the address validation to the country (see zip_code field)

zip_code.description: Shop contact address zip code. Mandatory (unless the country_iso_code corresponds to Chile or Peru)

circular_economy_data_collection.description: Allows operators to collect data related to the circular economy regulation

competitive_pricing_tool.description: The competitive pricing tool allows stores to view and possibly match competing Marketplace offers

direct_payment_customer_store.description: Allows transactions taking place outside of Mirakl between customers and sellers

disable_seller_alternative_carrier.description: Prevent stores from specifying alternatives carriers outside those predefined by the operator

kyc_status_per_seller.description: Allows PSPs to provide operators with seller KYC statuses

lead_time_to_ship_by_sellers_enabled.description: Allows sellers to override the default lead time to ship

multi_currency.description: Defines if platform support multi currencies

multi_payout_psp_per_seller.description: Allows the operator to use Hybrid pay-out PSP feature

no_reply_needed.description: Allows to end order-related conversations when the last message sent from customer does not specifically require a reply

offer_prices_decimals.description: Defines maximum number of decimals in offer prices

operator_csv_delimiter.description: The delimiter used in the CSV files exported from the back office. COMMA: ',' delimiter. SEMICOLON: ';' delimiter.

order_tax_mode.description: Prices with tax included or excluded in order-related APIs. TAX_INCLUDED: Prices with tax included. TAX_EXCLUDED: Prices with tax excluded.

payment_confirmation.description: Allows the operator to mark an accounting document as "Paid" when the corresponding amount is confirmed to be paid to the seller

product_data_validation_by_channel.description: Facilitates the management of attributes in a multilingual context

tax_collection.description: Allows the collection of information required to calculate taxes, with or without the tax connector

tax_id_number.description: Unique identifier used to conduct tax-related formalities

allow_shop_contribution_to_all_channels.description: Allows shops to contribute data to all sales channels when enabled; otherwise, data can only be pushed to channels the shop belongs to

exclude_invalid_products.description: When enabled, products with validation errors will be excluded from product imports and won't be transmitted to MCM

list_of_multiple_values_separator.description: Character used to separate values in the 'Multiple Values List' type attributes

product_acceptance_by_channel.description: Allows operators to accept or reject products according to sales channels

product_data_validation_by_channel.description: Facilitates the management of attributes in a multilingual context

product_import_only_on_leaf.description: Prevents the import of products into non-leaf categories

refund_cancel_authorized.description: Allows refund and cancelation for transactions taking place outside of Mirakl between customers and sellers

lead_time_to_ship.description: Allows sellers to inform a lead time to ship on their offers

maximum_order_quantity.description: Allows sellers to request for a maximum order quantity

minimum_order_quantity.description: Allows sellers to request for a minimum order quantity

package_order_quantity.description: Allows sellers to set an order quantity increment

no_customer_payment_confirmation.description: Allows seller payments to be completely separated from customer debits

order_acceptance.description: Indicate if shop accounts must accept new orders and take responsibility for the transaction. NOT_AUTOMATIC: All shop accounts must accept their orders manually. AUTOMATIC: Orders are automatically accepted. BOTH: AUTOMATIC or NOT_AUTOMATIC mode depending on the store account

pause_debit_workflow.description: Pause the order debit workflow when taxes must be recalculated

pay_on_due_date.description: Allows professionals to pay their orders after the receipt of the items or an explicit invoice

pay_on_shipment.description: Allows operators to debit orders before they have been fully shipped

sellers_edit_shipping_origin.description: Allow shop accounts to edit shipping origin to ensures accurate tax calculations with shipping origin data

shipping_and_billing_details_before_acce.description: Indicate if shipping and billing details are displayed before order acceptance

channel_pricing.description: Allows sellers to create prices applicable on the operators different storefronts materialized as sales channels in Mirakl. DISABLED: No channel pricing. SINGLE: Allows sellers to create one price per channel. MULTI: Allows sellers to create multiple prices per channel.

discount_period_required.description: Requires sellers to set start and end dates when creating or updating discounts on default and specific prices.

scheduled_pricing.description: Allows sellers to set up multiple prices in advance

multi_part_item_shipment.description: Allows sellers to create several packages for a same item in an order

multi_shipment.description: Allows sellers to create several shipments for a same order

local_tax_number.description: The VAT/GST number of a seller billing information and fiscal representative

tax_identification_number.description: The tax identification number of a seller billing information

mandatory.description: Defines if the VAT/GST number is mandatory

validation_regex.description: Regular expression that the VAT/GST number must match

mandatory.description: Defines if the tax identification number is mandatory

validation_regex.description: Regular expression that the tax identification number must match

activated.description: Tax collection activated. NO: Not activated. YES: Activated for all stores. YES_PER_STORE: Activated for some stores.

product_tax_code_mandatory.description: Product tax code mandatory at offer level

tax_collection_by_operator.description: Operator in charge of tax collection on behalf of sellers

validation_regex.description: Regular expression to match for sellers tax number ID

mirakl_catalog_integrator.description: Mirakl Catalog integrator activated. Allows operator to manage catalog structure into Mirakl.

mirakl_catalog_manager.description: Mirakl Catalog Manager activated. Allows operator to remove the complexity of integrating catalogs from multiple sources.

mirakl_platform_services.description: Mirakl Platform for Services activated. Specific module for services management: separated from the product management module.

offer_management.description: Offer management available on the platform

offer_management_mode.description: Offer management mode on the platform: SIMPLE: All shops can push offers. HYBRID: The operator decides whether a shop can push offers on the platform.

order_management.description: Order management available on the platform

order_management_mode.description: Order management mode on the platform: SIMPLE: All shops can process orders. HYBRID: The operator decides whether a shop can process orders on the platform.

tax_manager.description: Allows operator to be connected with a tax calculation provider

tax_provider.description: The tax provider processing tax estimation

customer_model.description: The customer organization activation on the platform

platform_model.description: The platform models activated on the platform

b2b.description: Customer model Business to Business is enabled: if true, customers can be linked to a customer organization

b2c.description: Customer model Business to Customer is enabled: if true, customers can be created without being linked to a customer organization

is_customer_right.description: Indicate if reason is enabled to the customer

is_operator_right.description: Indicate if reason is enabled to the operator

is_shop_right.description: Indicate if reason is enabled to the shop

shop_id.description: The id of the shop owning the document

next_page_token.description: Token to access the next page. Absent if the current page is the last one.

previous_page_token.description: Token to access the previous page. Absent if the current page is the first one.

booking.description: Indicates the booking method for services based on the model

consumption.description: Indicates the consumption method for services based on the model

custom_attributes.description: Service model custom attributes. The list is ordered as configured by the operator.

location.description: Indicates the location method for services based on the model

pricing.description: Indicates the pricing method for services based on the model

quantity.description: Indicate the quantity fields requirements for services based on the model

order_configuration.description: Custom attribute order configuration. Absent when the attribute is not applicable to orders.

service_configuration.description: Custom attribute service configuration. Absent when the attribute is not applicable to services.

maximum_number_of_elements.description: Maximum number of elements. Present only for ValueLists. Absent when no limit.

shop_permission.description: Determines how Shops are allowed to use the custom attribute

maximum_number_of_elements.description: Maximum number of elements. Present only for ValueLists. Absent when no limit.

minimum_number_of_elements.description: Minimum number of elements. Equals to 0 if element is optional.

options.description: Service model pricing options. The list is ordered as configured by the operator.

price_per_unit_options.description: Service model price per unit options. Always present if pricing is multi price.

type.description:
Pricing type
When the price type is FIXED_PRICE, the price defined when placing an order is final. The price cannot be modified.
When the price type is ESTIMATED_PRICE, the price can be negotiated between the seller and the customer. The price can be updated by editing the pricing options of the order.
When the price type is FIXED_PRICE_MULTI, the price defined when placing an order is final. The price cannot be modified. The price has multiple possibilities.
When the price type is ESTIMATED_PRICE_MULTI, the price can be negotiated between the seller and the customer. The price can be updated by editing the pricing options of the order. The price has multiple possibilities.

maximum_number_of_elements.description: Maximum number of elements. Present only for ValueLists. Absent when no limit.

minimum_number_of_elements.description: Minimum number of elements. Equals to 0 if element is optional.

maximum_number_of_elements.description: Maximum number of selectable elements. Present only for value lists. Absent when no limit.
Maximum number of elements. Present only for ValueLists. Absent when no limit.

minimum_number_of_elements.description: Minimum number of elements. Equals to 0 if element is optional.

booking.description: Booking information to update for this order.

custom_attribute_values.description:
Order custom attribute values to update.
Only specified custom attribute values will be updated. In order to delete a custom attribute value, set it to null.

SOR04_Request_Booking.description: Booking information to update for this order.

confirmed_time_slots.description: List of time slots confirmed for this order. An order can only have one confirmed time slots for now.

session.description: Session information to update for this order.

SOR04_Request_CustomAttributeValues.description:
Order custom attribute values to update.
Only specified custom attribute values will be updated. In order to delete a custom attribute value, set it to null.

options.description:
Order pricing options to update. Only specified pricing options will be updated (non specified pricing option will be ignored).
Please note that pricing options cannot be updated after the order is accepted (excluded).

SOR04_Request_Price_Options.description:
Order pricing options to update. Only specified pricing options will be updated (non specified pricing option will be ignored).
Please note that pricing options cannot be updated after the order is accepted (excluded).

amount.description: Amount of the pricing option to update. Required if value is present. In order to delete a pricing option, set it to null (along with value).

taxes.description:
Tax amounts to update.
If the taxes node is provided, all previous tax information on this pricing option will be replaced by the new ones. So, in order to delete all the taxes, set the taxes node to null.

value.description: Value of the pricing option to update. Required if amount is present. In order to delete a pricing option, set it to null (along with amount).

values.description:
Values of the pricing option to update.
If the values node is provided, all previous values on this pricing option will be replaced by the new ones. In order to delete a pricing option, set the values node to null.

taxes.description:
Tax amounts to update.
If the taxes node is provided, all previous tax information on this pricing option will be replaced by the new ones. So, in order to delete all the taxes, set the taxes node to null.

can_evaluate.description: Indicates if the order can be evaluated by the customer

custom_attribute_values.description: Custom attribute values defined on the order

has_open_incident.description: true if order has an incident open

refunds.description: The list of refunds, sorted by creation date in ascending order

warnings.description: A list of warnings that should be checked before validating the order

confirmed_time_slots.description: Confirmed time slots by the shop

contact_info.description: Customer contact information that will be used by the shop

time_slots.description: Preferred time slots selected by the customer

contact_info.description: Customer contact information that will be used by the shop

amount_excluding_taxes.description: Order commission amount, shop taxes excluded

amount_including_taxes.description: Order commission amount, shop taxes included

locale.description: RFC 3066 code of the customer's locale

civility.description: Civility of the person associated with the address

company.description: Company of the person associated with the address

complementary.description: Complementary information line of the street of the address

country_code.description: Country ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code of the address, used by Mirakl to format the address (back-office, delivery bill, invoices...)

first_name.description: First name of the person associated with the address

last_name.description: Last name of the person associated with the address

street1.description: First information line of the street of the address

street2.description: Second information line of the street of the address

SOR04_Response_200_Location_AtCustomerLo.description: The Service is provided at customer location

civility.description: Civility of the person associated with the address

company.description: Company of the person associated with the address

complementary.description: Complementary information line of the street of the address

country_code.description: Country ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code of the address, used by Mirakl to format the address (back-office, delivery bill, invoices...)

first_name.description: First name of the person associated with the address

last_name.description: Last name of the person associated with the address

street1.description: First information line of the street of the address

street2.description: Second information line of the street of the address

SOR04_Response_200_Location_AtShopLocati.description: The Service takes place at shop location

shop_locations.description: Locations where the service can be provided

center.description: Center of the area covered by the location

radius.description: Radius covered from the center, in meters

distance.description: Distance from the search center in meters. Null if no search center was used in request.

formatted_address.description: Formatted address of the zone reference.

SOR04_Response_200_Location_NoLocation.description: The Service is provided remotely (hence has no location)

options.description: Order pricing options. The list is ordered as configured by the operator at the time of the order.

amount.description: Amount which will be paid by the Customer for one item (unit price). If taxes or options are also given, this amount is considered as 'excluding taxes and options' and the total amount of the order can be determined by adding this amount, all tax amounts and all options amounts.

Amount which will be paid by the Customer for one item (unit price). If taxes or options are also given, this amount is considered as 'excluding taxes and options' and the total amount of the order can be determined by adding this amount, all tax amounts and all options amounts.

Amount which was refunded. If taxes or options are also present, this amount is considered as 'excluding taxes and options' and the total amount of the refund can be determined by adding this amount, all tax amounts and all options amounts.

amount_excluding_taxes.description: Order commission amount, shop taxes excluded

amount_including_taxes.description: Order commission amount, shop taxes included

custom_attribute_values.description: Custom attribute values defined on the service

date_consumed.description: Service consumption date. Required only when the Order consumption must be confirmed by Shop

voucher_code.description: Service voucher code. Required only when the Order consumption requires a voucher

customer_id.description: Identifier of the customer who posted the evaluation

firstname.description: First name of the customer who posted the evaluation

lastname.description: Last name of the customer who posted the evaluation

reply.description: Reply of a shop or operator on an evaluation

visible.description: Whether the evaluation is visible or not

get.description: List locale codes and labels from your platform to automate product format exports (API H01, PM01, VL01) from your PIM system

List platform configurations such as general information, modules and features activated.

Note: This configuration represents modules and major features enabled during platform setup. This differs from the PC02 API which export the platform business settings configurable by the operator in the back office.

This API returns cancellation, refund, incident, and message reasons.
Reasons are sorted by type then sort index (set in the back-office)

parameters.description: A list of shop identifiers
parameters.name: shop_ids

parameters.description: True to include deleted documents, false to remove them
parameters.name: include_deleted

parameters.description: Retrieve shop documents modified at or after this date. The time period cannot exceed 90 days
parameters.name: updated_since

get.description:
• It is mandatory to specify either the shop_ids or the document_ids.
  • If a list of document identifiers is specified only these documents are downloaded.
    • If more than one document id is specified, the documents will be wrapped in a ZIP archive
    • If only one document id is specified the document will not be zipped
  • If a list of shop identifiers is specified, all documents from those shops are downloaded.
    Use a list of shop document type codes to retrieve specific types from those shops.
    In this case, the output of the API will always be a ZIP archive even if there is only one document to retrieve.

When documents are retrieved, they're wrapped into a ZIP archive except when only one document id is specified. The tree structure of this archive is as follow:

documents-timestamp.zip
|
|__ shop_id_x/
|   |__ foo.txt
|   |__ bar.txt
|   |__ baz.pdf
|
|__ shop_id_y/
|   |__ image.png
|   |__ image(1).png

Returns a 404 if at least one document id, one shop id or one document type code is invalid

parameters.description: A list of shop identifiers (separated by a comma). It is mandatory to specify either the shop_ids or the document_ids
parameters.name: shop_ids

parameters.description: A list of document identifiers (separated by a comma). It is mandatory to specify either the shop_ids or the document_ids
parameters.name: document_ids

parameters.description: A list of document type codes (separated by a comma)
parameters.name: type_codes
